title: Is This It
description: A raw and infectious debut that revitalized rock for a new generation.

title: In Utero
description: A raw, unapologetic, and honest reflection of grunge's essence.

title: Funeral
description: An emotionally powerful and sonically rich album with anthemic tunes.

title: Yankee Hotel Foxtrot
description: A bold experimentation in sound that became an indie classic.

title: Unknown Pleasures
description: A hauntingly atmospheric album that defined a genre.

title: Siamese Dream
description: An ambitious and grandiose sonic journey through the '90s.

title: Turn On the Bright Lights
description: A moody and atmospheric album that defined a post-punk revival.

title: Antics
description: A follow-up to their debut, continuing their unique sound.

title: Merriweather Post Pavilion
description: A mind-bending and eclectic album pushing the boundaries of sound.

title: The Suburbs
description: An exploration of suburban life with a blend of nostalgia and commentary.
